mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CLASS_TIME ( CLASS_DATE, CLASS_START_TIME, CLASS_END_TIME, CLASS_NO ) VALUES ( #{classDate}, #{classStartTime}, #{classEndTime}, #{classNo} )

INSERT INTO TB_SCHEDULE ( SCHEDULE_NO, TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, DESCRIPTION, CLASS_NO, TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_SCHEDULE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{description}, #{classNo}, #{type} )
mapper.select: SELECT CLASS_DATE, CLASS_START_TIME, CLASS_END_TIME, CLASS_NO FROM TB_CLASS_TIME WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} AND CLASS_DATE = #{classDate}
SELECT CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, COURSE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, USER_NO, ROOM_NAME FROM TB_CLASS ORDER BY START_DATE DESC

SELECT c.CLASS_NO AS classNo, c.CLASS_NAME AS className, c.START_DATE AS startDate, c.END_DATE AS endDate, c.COURSE_NAME AS courseName, c.DESCRIPTION AS description, c.USER_NO AS userNo, c.ROOM_NAME AS roomName,
u.USER_NAME AS userName,
( SELECT LISTAGG(GROUPED.DATES || CHR(10) || GROUPED.CLASS_START_TIME || '~' || GROUPED.CLASS_END_TIME, CHR(10) || CHR(10)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY GROUPED.ORDER_INDEX) FROM ( SELECT LISTAGG(CLASS_DATE, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY CLASS_ORDER) AS DATES, CLASS_START_TIME, CLASS_END_TIME, MIN(CLASS_ORDER) AS ORDER_INDEX FROM ( SELECT CLASS_DATE, CLASS_START_TIME, CLASS_END_TIME, CASE CLASS_DATE WHEN '월' THEN 1 WHEN '화' THEN 2 WHEN '수' THEN 3 WHEN '목' THEN 4 WHEN '금' THEN 5 ELSE 6 END AS CLASS_ORDER FROM TB_CLASS_TIME WHERE CLASS_NO = c.CLASS_NO ) GROUP BY CLASS_START_TIME, CLASS_END_TIME ) GROUPED ) AS classTime
FROM TB_CLASS c JOIN TB_USER u ON c.USER_NO = u.USER_NO
